name: Doom Buggy
description:
Do you enjoy explosions and destruction?  Jumping off of ramps? What about driving? And we mean driving fast. Welcome to Doom Buggy! Where your main objective is to simply destroy. Utilize the ramps to escape or for a really cool finisher. Drive through piles of tires to find gas cans for boost and look out for armor dropped from destroyed vehicles to protect your car.

Happy destruction!

 The programs we used are:

Maya, Zbrush, Substance Painter, Photoshop, Unreal Engine 4, Perforce, and Substance Designer.  

This is a student lead project, we are a team of three artists and two programmers graduating Academy of Interactive Entertainment on June 18th!
